item.title: Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei warns: AI will match ‘country of geniuses’ by 2026
item.description: Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei warns AI will reach genius-level capabilities by 2026, calling Paris Summit a "missed opportunity" as U.S. and European lea...

item.title: LangChain shows AI agents aren’t human-level yet because they’re overwhelmed by tools
item.description: LangChain evaluated a single AI agent to see if its performance degrades when given more context and tools, essentially overwhelming it.

item.title: Cerebras-Perplexity deal targets $100B search market with ultra-fast AI
item.description: Cerebras and Perplexity AI launch ultra-fast Sonar search model running at 1,200 tokens per second, challenging traditional search engines.

item.title: Fast break AI: How Databricks helped the Pacers slash ML costs 12,000X% while speeding up insights
item.description: The jaw-dropping decrease is a credit not only to Databricks, but PS&E's ability to reduce ML compute to near-infinitesimal amounts.

item.title: ConverzAI bags $16M for virtual recruiters that deliver 30% efficiency boost for enterprises
item.description: AI-driven virtual recruiters handle key elements of the hiring process, including sourcing, engaging candidates, screening and placement.
